item.title: Your start with CMake: As simple as it can get
item.description: When I recently started to work with CMake for a C++ project, I did find it difficult to start with it. The documentation is great, but extensive. There are of course multiple helpful articles and tutorials around, but I was already struggling with the simplest commands. This article is mainly for the people, who use CMake for the first time. I will try to use as less words and to be as clear as possible.
